name: Mara Jade With Lightsaber
Lore: 'Ordered to kill Luke Skywalker. Assumed the identity of a dancer named ''Arica'' in order to sneak into Jabba''s Palace.',
Text: 'While Luke or Emperor on table, power +1 and she moves for free. Permanent weapon is •Mara Jade''s Lightsaber (may target a character or creature for free; draw two destiny; target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if total destiny > defense value).',
